data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Tahoua, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tahoua, Niger

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Tahoua, Niger to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 13 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Tahoua, Niger.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Tahoua, Niger so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 26,546 believers in Tahoua to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,715,354 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Moor people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Moor people.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Tahoua, Niger to the gospel today.
Father, please give the people in the state of Tahoua access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tahoua, Niger has a population of 2,741,900.

We estimate Tahoua has 26,546 people who might know Jesus, 16,432 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,698,922 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 103 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Tahoua, Niger a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Tahoua
location.cities_list: Tahoua, Birni N Konni, Madaoua, Illela, Illéla
location.cities_list_w_pop: Tahoua (80,425), Birni N Konni (48,103), Madaoua (24,804), Illela (17,461), Illéla (16,678)
